price: 82. Waxay yidhaahdeen: “Ma markaan dhimanno oo aan noqonno carro iyo lafo, miyaa markaa nala soo bixin?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
